column4: I've blacklisted b43 and ssb in /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist. b43 does not load any more, but ssb still does. How can I get ssb to stop loading?
why do you want to stop ssb from loading?
because b43 doesn't seem to work with my card. I want to run ndiswrapper...
try it without disabling ssb, other drivers use ssb too
